body: Have you tried to plot the results of the daylight analysis with 3D chart and make sure the generated a meaningful lighting schedule? [Here is an example](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Integrated_Daylight_and_Energy_simulation&slide=0&scale=6.9644045063690045&offset=-4016.800089233676,-2304.2556834223396) on how to do it.
